S1M-2776 Bruce Crawford: The Scotland Act 1998 (Agency Arrangements) (Specification) Order 2002-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Scotland Act 1998 (Agency Arrangements) (Specification) Order 2002. Supported by: Fiona McLeod
